# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(RAW_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(RAW)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
RAWPluginInfo.C
RAWCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
RAWPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
RAWMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtRAWFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
RAWEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtRAWFileFormat.C
avtRAWWriter.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IRAWDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IRAWDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IRAWDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MRAWDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MRAWDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MRAWDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MRAWDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(ERAWDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ERAWDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ERAWDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ERAWDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(ERAWDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ERAWDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ERAWDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ERAWDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_RTOD(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases RAW ${INSTALLTARGETS})
